etymologies: early 20th century: from sym-‘with, together’ + Greek patra ‘fatherland’+ -ic

definitions: (of animals or plants, especially of related species or populations) occurring within the same geographical area; overlapping in distribution.
shortDefinitions: (of animals or plant species or populations) occurring within same or overlapping geographical areas

definitions: (of speciation) taking place without geographical separation.
shortDefinitions: (of speciation) taking place without geographical separation
